description.name: BitPay Checkout
features: Accept payment in all major cryptocurrencies including BTC, ETH, USDC, LTC, and more. Customers can use any crypto wallet to pay
Price all payments in your local currency and let BitPay handle the conversion to crypto
Get settled daily via bank transfer (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.) or in your preferred cryptocurrency
No chargeback risk associated with crypto payments
Manage and track your crypto payments and merchant account using BitPay's web portal
